text: Three Days Grace is a Canadian rock band that formed in 1997. They have released six studio albums, four extended plays, twenty two singles, two video albums, and fifteen music videos. They signed with Jive Records and released three albums on the label between 2003 and 2009 before the label was folded into the RCA Records umbrella in 2011; the band has released music through that label since then. All but one of their singles ("Riot" in 2007) have charted in the top 10 on the Billboard Mainstream Rock Songs chart.
